DIAGNOSIS:     
1.  Skin, Left Dorsal Forearm, Biopsy- Shave:
    - Malignant melanoma, predominantly in situ, focally invasive to 0.2 mm;
extending to side tissue edges (see note).

Note: No ulceration is present (pT1a). No dermal melanocytic mitoses or
lymphovascular invasion are seen. Regression changes are noted. Focal
associated dermal nevus is seen.
